previous.excerpt: Salut is a creator platform for fitness pros. We make it fun and easy for fitness creators to build and monetize a community. Schedule, stream, socialize, and monetize virtual fitness content - all in one app for free.

next.excerpt: Bounty lets you get paid for referring friends to jobs. If you don't know someone you can refer, share the bounty and get a cut of the prize pool.
next.title: Bounty - Get paid for referring friends to jobs 💰

localize.description: Bounty可以让你因推荐朋友工作而获得报酬。如果您不认识可以推荐的人，分享赏金并获得奖金池的一部分。
localize.tagline: 推荐朋友工作获得报酬 💰

localize.description: Bounty可以讓你因推薦朋友工作而獲得報酬。如果您不認識可以推薦的人，分享賞金並獲得獎金池的一部分。
localize.tagline: 推薦朋友工作獲得報酬 💰
